A&B Innovation Origins

Engineering spaces that feel secure, connected, and alive.

A&B Innovation was born in Kigali with one belief: physical environments should feel as intentional as the digital products they host. From private villas to national banks, we design experiences that inspire trust.

See our work Meet the team

Our manifesto

Technology should feel human.

We merge craftsmanship with software sensibilities. Rack layouts mimic art galleries, user flows drive camera placement, and clients receive playbooks for every install.

Design, Safety, Continuity

Review items

Payment policy: Pay after receiving standard products. For delivery + installation, settle 50% before dispatch and the remaining 50% once installation is completed. Installations outside Kigali can be negotiated.

Installation-only: If you prefer A&B Innovation to install equipment you already have on site, services are available and priced on a negotiated rate.
